name: WIRED (itch) (astrophics)
description:
complete the circuit before the power runs out

game features:

- 11 (really 10) pre-made levels to play

- simple level editor

WIRED was made for ludum dare 39 by astrophics

controls:

LMB - rotate tile clockwise/start game/place tile

RMB - rotate tile counter-clockwise/select gamemode/delete tile

M - mute/unmute

R - restart level

tools used:

programming - Game Maker Studio 2

art - Aseprite

music - Bosca Ceoil

sfx - Chiptone
